content.prompt: The function of the adjectives “picturesque,” “quaint,” and “amusing” in the first half of the second paragraph is primarily to

choices.label: introduce a sense of the town’s fanciful residential design
inject comedy into the description of the town
define the character of the town’s leading families
call the supposed modernity of the town into question

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
